    • getArchivingContext

      @Deprecated public static Map<Object,Object> getArchivingContext()
      Deprecated.
      This method will be removed in a future release. Do not use. use getArchivingContext(Object) to query the archiving context by object key use addArchivingContext(Object, Object) to add new archiving context by object key
      Returns archiving context map.
      Returns:
      a map for customers information

    • addArchivingContext

      public static void addArchivingContext(Object key, Object value)
      This will add customer information into archiving context during archiving process or archive document restoring process. It will throw an exception if no archiving or archive document restoring process is active.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if if no archiving or archive document restoring process is active.

    • getArchivingContext

      public static Object getArchivingContext(Object key)
      This will return a context object by Object Key during archiving process or archive document restoring process. It will throw an exception if no archiving or archive document restoring process is active.
      Returns:
      a context object by a string key for customer information
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no archiving or archive document restoring process is active.

    • getContextIssueIfNotEmpty

      public static String getContextIssueIfNotEmpty()
      This will log any context issues that exist
      Returns:
      the concatenated string of issues

    • validateLinks

      public static List<String> validateLinks(RootInfo ri)
      Validate links for a graph
      Parameters:
      ri - the root information
      Returns:
      any errors from this validation

      public static void checkAndScheduleForArchive(RootInfo rootInfo)
